favourite.article: The precious blood of Jesus, the foundation and essence of the Christian faith. Glory to God.

Rejoice in the Lord with exceeding joy! Trust Him with every ounce of your being. You will never be disappointed. Never. What a great song and so well played. We sometimes get sad about our sin, and condemn ourselves. But this song says it all. Rejoice in your weakness!! Why? Because of God's power shown in the blood of Christ. This song is full of eternal joy as we also can be, even in sin! The blood is greater than our sin and can lift us right out of the mud, right out of our garments stained with sin, into our new Garment, Christ Himself. What joy! What power! Can we take this all in? Can we rejoice fully in our weaknesses like Paul? Hallelujah!
This hymn is a tonic to my soul.
The blood of Jesus is everything we need for our garments to be spotless and clean. Very mighty and powerful hymn. Thank You JESUS for Your blood.

May the precious blood of Jesus wash and cleanse us from all known and unknown sins in Jesus Name Amen. May we have inward Holiness in Jesus Name Amen. May we experience Holiness within and without in Jesus Name Amen. Oh Lord prepare us for the heavenly home in Jesus Name Amen. Make our hearts pure and give us the Grace to live holy lives in Jesus Name Amen. Thanks for uploading this song and God bless you all.
It's amazing what Jesus has done for us. My prayer is that we shall be found ready at His coming and our garments shall be found spotless. Amen.
The song is an inspiration to my heart. To continue serving my Redeemer.
This will blessing to all the people who sing this song. GOD bless you!!!!
Thank You, Lord Jesus, for shedding Your sacred blood to wash me clean.
We are washed in the blood, In the soul-cleansing blood of the Lamb! Yes, our garments are spotless! They are WHITE AS SNOW! We are washed in the blood of the Lamb!

I love this song, I was touched by the lyrics and it deeply moved my spirit! I appreciate the Lord Jesus' great love towards us and because of that I can't hold my tears , tears of joy that with His precious blood we can be cleansed. Amen!!!

Thanks be to God for His unspeakable gift of our Lord Jesus Christ. We can now enter boldly, but with holy fear and trembling, into the throne of grace by a new and living way, the precious blood of Jesus to obtain mercy and find grace to help in the time of need.
Jesus is faithful and just.
I love this song.....

May the precious blood of Jesus wash and cleanse us from all known and unknown sins in Jesus Name Amen. Oh Lord prepare us for the heavenly home in Jesus Name Amen. Make our hearts pure and give us the Grace to live holy lives in Jesus Name Amen. Thanks for uploading this song and God bless you all.
I am aware of the subjective power of Jesus' love.

I was in a dream and the setting was a wedding ceremony for my late uncle that died recently and we are still preparing his burial ceremony. In the dream, my late uncle raised this song when the band was fumbling with their instrument and could not raise a music for the guests. When I woke up, I was moved to google the song and I found this. Thank you so much, the piano version was excellent. I had another opportunity to reflect on the wordings. They are reassuring. Thank God for His grace to us. Amen.
Great hymn. Inspiring and inviting. Just join many to sing and pray the chorus at Uncle Luka Sukai wake keep.
The blood indeed has cleansed me, I cherish this song so much.

This HYMN is a powerful one, depicting the blood that cleanse and can set free from sins and iniquities, irrespective of your Race, Tribe, Culture, Color and personality. It's a song that makes one trace his track back, to tune you back to your original state in Christ. God bless you all.
So inspiring and good for self examination!
So inspiring,I got an insight from this song now. I plead the blood of Jesus for my cleansing.
Amazing lyrics and quality of piano play. God bless you for this ministry.
So Inspiring!

It's in the URL address line in your browser, very last phrase. For example, for this hymn it says: http://www.hymnal.net/en/hymn/h/1007. So 1007 is the hymn number. Since I am answering your query, I will also make a comment.
What a great song. Are you FULLY trusting in his grace this hour? I have to admit to my shame, I am a partial truster of grace. It's grace +. Grace + a back-up plan; grace + my clever working; grace + an influential person. But then I am short-changed of what I receive. Henceforth, let it be grace alone. Let me FULLY trust in his grace hour by hour, so that I need nothing else.
Why do they no longer have their numbers in the hymnal? That's the main reason I was searching for this song was to find what number it is in the hymnal.

I learnt this soul inspiring music early in life at my father's Anglican Church in Nigeria. It's one of the many soul inspiring Anglican music that opened my understanding of the power in the blood of Jesus.
This song makes me understand that it is only the blood of the Lamb-Jesus, that has got the power to cleanse us from our sins. Have you been to Him for your cleansing?
Great song to always remember not only be sung but the wordings must be meditated upon and stored in our memories. The Blood of Jesus cleans us from all unrighteousness. He is able, Amen.
I first know this song in our Tamil language. Anyway good song for choir.
There's a fountain flowing for the soul unclean, O be washed in the blood of the Lamb. Amen! Hallelujah~
I heard this song at a 6th grade conference and a week after the conference I had a baptism and witnessed God's cleaning power
I thank Jesus for His cleansing power.
I am ready for cleansing power, I love the song very much, I always play before going to bed and I pray that the LORD WILL INCREASE MY FAITH.

On Sunday morning 23 May 2010 I was getting ready to go to the worship service when my ears heard this song I was filled with the Holy Spirit and gave glory to the Lord Almighty and shared the same with the fellow believers. Can you please give the story behind the song?

This song is very, very nice. I heard this song firstly from our local dialect Arunachalee then Hindi, lastly English. This song is really touching to my heart. I am really washed in the blood of Lamb. Praise the LORD.
Whenever I meditate on this hymn, I see every reason to be washed in the blood of the Lamb.
It is a real blessing and we need to be washed in the blood.
Praise the Lord! We are washed in the blood of the Lamb, hallelujah for such a redemption.
Nice song.
Precious blood of Jesus.

I got to know this song through the Korean hymn book and it was such a delight to sing it in English! When I heard the tune I just started dancing! It's so good to praise God and to know that we are purified by the blood of Jesus, our Saviour! God bless you all!
